title: Consequences
description: After a tragic loss, Triston and Kiley finally start to find comfort in each other. One might assume this is where a happily ever after would start…However, this isn’t that kind of love story.Triston still finds himself drowning in lies, stress, and emotional chaos.While Kiley is still avoiding the pain of her loss and attempting to handle everything on her own.What happens when secrets start to push them apart?Especially when they are both left desperate for relief.One thing is for sure, Breaking the Rules, always has some CONSEQUENCES.
author: Robin Falcon
